welcome_paragraph: Le module ibonelela ngolwazi olubalulekileyo kunye nezixhobo zokuxhasa impilo yomama nomntwana.
resource_intro: Khangela izixhobo zemfundo ezilungiselelwe ukuxhasa oomama, iintsapho, kunye nabasebenzi bezempilo.
symptomsContent: Ukugabha, ukudinwa, kunye nokutshintsha kwemood kuqhelekile ekuqaleni kokukhulelwa.
nutritionContent: Gxila kwi-folic acid, ukutya okunentsimbi, kunye nokusela amanzi amaninzi.
wellnessContent: Utshintsho lwehomoni lunokuchaphazela iimvakalelo. Ukuphumla, ukubhala, kunye nokuthetha nomntu omthemba kunokunceda.
exerciseContent: Imisebenzi ethambileyo efana nokuhamba, ukubhukuda, kunye ne-yoga yexesha lokukhulelwa inceda ukujikeleza kwegazi nokunciphisa uxinzelelo.
checkupContent: Uvavanyo lwe-ultrasound kunye novavanyo lweglucose luqhelekile kulesi sigaba. Qhubeka nokundwendwela ugqirha.
birthPrepContent: Pakisha ibhegi yesibhedlele, jonga izicwangciso zokubeleka, kwaye uqaphele iimpawu zokubeleka.
emotionalPrepContent: Qhelisela iindlela zokuphefumla, yiya kwiiklasi zokubeleka, kwaye uthethe ngezicwangciso zangemva kokubeleka nabantu obathembileyo.
finalPrepContent: Qinisekisa isicwangciso sakho sokubeleka nogqirha, jonga abafowunelwa kwimeko yongxamiseko, kwaye ulungiselele ukwamkelwa esibhedlele.
child_growth_milestones_description: Landela ukukhula komzimba, ingqondo, kunye neemvakalelo zomntwana ukusuka ekuzalweni ukuya ebusheni.
child_growth_milestones_intro: Qonda amanqanaba okukhula ukusuka ebuntwaneni ukuya ebusheni.
infant_milestones: Ukuncuma, ukujikeleza, ukuhlala, ukuq crawla, amagama okuqala.
toddler_milestones: Ukuhamba, ukugijima, imisho elula, ukudlala ngokufanayo.
adolescent_milestones: Utshintsho lobutsha, ukucinga okunzulu, ukwakha isazisi.
tip_play: Khuthaza ukudlala ukuze kwakhe izakhono zomzimba kunye nezokuziphatha.
tip_talk: Thetha kwaye ufunde nomntwana wakho yonke imihla.
tip_nutrition: Nika ukutya okunempilo ukuze akhule kakuhle.
